description: Savory vegetarian zucchini and rice pie.

directions.step: Mince the onion and saute it at medium heat in 2 tablespoons of oil and some water.
While the onion is cooking flatten one puff pastry sheet to cover the bottom and sides of a rectangular metal or glass oven proof dish with a bit extra all around to roll into a crust later.
Flatten the other sheet to about the size of the bottom of the cookie sheet and set aside.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Shred the zucchini in a food processor with a large shredding attachment.
When the onion is cooked add the rice and let it heat up and get glossy.
Let the onions and rice mixture cool and then add the all the other ingredients, including salt, pepper and marjoram to taste, and mix well.
Pour this mixture into the prepared cookie sheet, level it, and cover everything with the second sheet of puff pastry.
Pinch the edges of the two sheets together and roll them to seal and create the crust. With a fork puncture the top sheet evenly to prevent blistering.
Bake in the oven for about 45 minutes or when the puff pastry becomes golden.
